HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 01 Aug 2019No. But these days, we don't sign up direct with the bank anymore. We Sign up via:SingsaverMoneysmartGobearThey work with the bank, take a commission for gaining new cc sign up, with that they give applicants a cut via groceries or shopping voucher or lucky draw (Gobear).
They are legit. Why go with these ? The extra voucher you get with them and You can get also the bank sign up gift / bonuses So stack up and get more! :) P/S: When applying, remember to read and follow the instructions closely so nothings get lost in the process. Happy stacking :P0 comments0
